__e: Wade didn't waste any time, did he?
Wade, aren't you going to stay for supper?
Listen, if I'd warned you, if I'd said, "Wade isn't your true love, he's... You're just the best fun he ever had." You'd have called it a wicked lie.
This is a big outfit, Wade's gang.
Albert you know the kind of man Wade is.
- Is Roger Wade his real name?
Ended up claiming he could make me forget Jess Wade and you, all in one night.
Well, little Wade and I don't have to stay.
You're too late, Wade with too little.
Wade, will you stop fooling around?
Mr. Wade, you can't mean that...
Wade, you've been saying that for months.
